# thalassa_tfs_instance (Data Source)

Get a TFS (Thalassa Filesystem Service) instance



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `identity` (String) Identity of the TFS instance
- `name` (String) Name of the TFS instance
- `organisation_id` (String) Reference to the Organisation of the TFS Instance. If not provided, the organisation of the (Terraform) provider will be used.

### Read-Only

- `annotations` (Map of String) Annotations for the TFS instance
- `delete_protection` (Boolean) Delete protection of the TFS instance
- `description` (String) Description of the TFS instance
- `endpoints` (List of Object) List of endpoints for the TFS instance (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--endpoints))
- `id` (String) Identity of the TFS instance
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels for the TFS instance
- `region` (String) Region of the TFS instance
- `security_group_ids` (List of String) List of security group identities attached to the TFS instance
- `size_gb` (Number) Size of the TFS instance in GB
- `slug` (String) Slug of the TFS instance
- `status` (String) Status of the TFS instance
- `subnet_id` (String) Identity of the subnet
- `vpc_id` (String) Identity of the VPC

<a id="nestedatt--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String)
- `hostname` (String)
- `identity` (String)
- `port` (Number)
